input.sentences: our hotel overlooked a large beach .
some areas were choppy and filled with waves .
other parts of the water were quite smooth .
the ocean extended as far as the eye could see .
we saw some cute dogs on the beach as well .
output.sentences: The overlooked beach was quiet and serene
As visitors arrives, the waves began to rise and hit the shoreline
but then a break in the waves gives calm waters
and a beautiful shoreline appears again
and then finally sitting on the sand with the dogs can be calm and relaxing
